queries.query:
from(bucket: "Pot_pruebas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tracker")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "servo_h" or r["_field"] == "servo_v")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "Pot_pruebas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tracker" and r._field == "env_state_id")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      env_state_label:
        if r._value == 0 then "SUNNY"
        else if r._value == 1 then "CLOUDY"
        else if r._value == 2 then "UNSTABLE"
        else if r._value == 3 then "HUMID_HAZY"
        else "NA"
  }))
  |> yield(name: "labeled")

from(bucket: "Pot_pruebas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tracker")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bme_press_hpa")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "Pot_pruebas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tracker")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bme_hum_pct")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "Pot_pruebas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tracker")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ldr_norm_tr" or r["_field"] == "ldr_norm_tl" or r["_field"] == "ldr_norm_bl" or r["_field"] == "ldr_norm_br")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "Pot_pruebas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tracker")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "voltage_error" or r["_field"] == "voltage_predicted" or r["_field"] == "panel_voltage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "Pot_pruebas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tracker")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bme_temp_c")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tracker")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bme_alt_m")

  |> yield(name: "mean")
